description: A surgical procedure to remove all or part of the thyroid gland.

attributes.name: presence_of_surgical_changes
attributes.description: Indicates whether surgical changes are present or absent.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Indicates the status of the finding.

attributes.name: extent_of_surgery
attributes.description: Indicates the extent of the thyroidectomy surgery.

values.name: total thyroidectomy
values.description: The entire thyroid gland has been removed.

values.name: partial thyroidectomy
values.description: Only a part of the thyroid gland has been removed.

values.name: right hemithyroidectomy
values.description: The right half of the thyroid gland has been removed.

values.name: left hemithyroidectomy
values.description: The left half of the thyroid gland has been removed.
